Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our authentic Punjabi cuisine, location on historic Route 66, and dining experience.

Spice Grill & Bar serves authentic Punjabi Indian cuisine, featuring Tandoori specialties, rich curries, and freshly baked naans, blending traditional spices with modern culinary excellence.
Yes, Spice Grill & Bar is 100% Halal certified, ensuring all our meat dishes meet strict halal standards for our guests.
We are open Monday through Thursday from 8:00 AM to 9:00 PM, and Friday through Sunday from 8:00 AM to 10:00 PM.
Yes, we offer a wide variety of vegetarian and vegan-friendly dishes, including Shahi Paneer, Dal Tadka, Aloo Gobhi, and Chana Masala, all prepared with authentic spices.
We are located at 33 Lewis Ave, Ash Fork, AZ 86320, right on historic Route 66 and Interstate-40 Exit 146, making us a perfect pitstop for Grand Canyon travelers.
We offer takeout, pickup, and curbside service. You can place your order online through our secure ordering partner, Toast.
Yes, we have ample parking available for cars and are proud to be a biker-friendly destination with space for motorcycles.
Yes, we serve a selection of Beer, Wine, and other alcoholic beverages to complement your meal.
Our guest favorites include Butter Chicken, Goat Curry, Shahi Paneer, Fish Pakora, and our signature Garlic Naan baked over a traditional clay oven.
Yes, we are a family-friendly restaurant with a welcoming atmosphere and seating suitable for both small and large groups, including families with children.
SPICE GRILL & BAR

Elevating Punjabi cuisine with modern techniques and a commitment to authentic flavors.
